page_content: The page provides information about elections held on October 20, 2019, in the Canton of Aargau, including how to vote and where to find results.
The page provides guidelines and forms related to energy laws and regulations, focusing on building and energy technology.
The page provides information and guidelines on the acquisition of real estate in Switzerland by foreign individuals.
The page provides information on how municipalities can apply for lighting compensation for cantonal roads, including the required documents and conditions.
The page discusses an archaeological dig in Gebenstorf that provided new insights into a Roman settlement and its connection to the legionary camp Vindonissa.
